descriptions: Does not demonstrate understanding of place value and cannot identify the relevant place value for rounding.
Demonstrates limited understanding of place value and struggles to identify the relevant place value for rounding.
Demonstrates some understanding of place value but makes frequent errors when identifying the relevant place value for rounding.
Demonstrates a general understanding of place value and can usually identify the relevant place value for rounding with occasional errors.
Demonstrates a solid understanding of place value and accurately identifies the relevant place value for rounding in most cases.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of place value and accurately identifies the relevant place value for rounding in all cases.
Rounding is consistently incorrect, showing no understanding of rounding rules.
Rounding is frequently incorrect, indicating a poor understanding of rounding rules.
Rounding is sometimes correct, but errors are common, suggesting a partial understanding of rounding rules.
Rounding is mostly correct, with occasional errors due to misunderstanding of rounding rules.
Rounding is accurate in most cases, demonstrating a strong understanding of rounding rules.
Rounding is consistently accurate, demonstrating a complete and thorough understanding of rounding rules.
Unable to apply rounding skills to solve problems.
Struggles to apply rounding skills to solve problems and is unable to provide explanations.
Can sometimes apply rounding skills to solve simple problems, but struggles with more complex scenarios.
Generally applies rounding skills to solve problems, but requires some assistance or makes minor errors.
Confidently applies rounding skills to solve a variety of problems.
Expertly applies rounding skills to solve complex problems and provides clear and accurate explanations.
